title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder, it still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: When attempting to use the expression builder after setting aliases for columns in a dataset, the tool displays the original column names instead of the assigned aliases.
EB: Expect the expression builder to reflect the aliases set for columns in the dataset when selecting it.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the dataset management section.
2. Set aliases for columns in the dataset.
3. Access the expression builder and attempt to select the dataset.
4. Observe that the expression builder displays the original column names instead of the assigned aliases.
